metadata.title: CVE-2024-23252 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixedin Safari 17.4, iOS 17.4 and iPadOS 17.4, macOS Sonoma 14.4. Processing webcontent may lead to a denial-of-service.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
